response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This product embodies innovation, quality, and functionality, making it an unparalleled asset for those seeking to elevate their experiences or businesses. Given its unique value proposition and the extensive research and development that went into its creation, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $950,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents a significant savings compared to the market value. I believe that with its exceptional features and capabilities, this product will exceed your expectations and provide substantial benefits to you. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions about the product. I look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 950000}
